longBusinessSummary.0: Jindal Stainless Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of stainless-steel flat products in India and internationally. It provides ferro alloys, stainless steel slabs, hot rolled coils, plates and sheets, and cold rolled coils and sheets. The company's products are used in architecture, building and construction, automotive and transport, railway, consumer durable, process industry, precision strip and blade steel, coin blank, nuclear, and plumbing applications. Jindal Stainless Limited was founded in 1970 and is based in New Delhi, India.
